com.henrikhedberg.ohap

Class HbdpOhapServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.henrikhedberg.ohap.OhapServer
      • com.henrikhedberg.ohap.HbdpOhapServer

  • public class HbdpOhapServer
extends OhapServer
    Open Home Automation Protocol (OHAP) server with HBDP backend.

    The implementation relies on the HbdpServer and the com.sun.new.httpserver package.

    Version:
    1.0 (20160312)
    Author:
    Henrik Hedberg <henrik.hedberg@iki.fi>
